long_description: The wrap-around SunCloud Mischief polarized sunglasses keep out the harmful elements and protect kids' eyes from harmful UV rays. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and a third the weight. Lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely impact resistant. Frames feature polarized gray lenses to eliminate glare and to transmit true, natural colors. SunCloud Mischief polarized sunglasses are ideal for children ages 6 - 10.
short_description: The wrap-around SunCloud Mischief polarized sunglasses keep out the harmful elements and protect kids' eyes from harmful UV rays.
